nodes.text: During the early Clone Wars in 22 BBY, the Confederacy of Independent Systems laid siege to the planet Hisseen. Following the attack, the Jedi High Council dispatched Jedi Generals Obi-Wan Kenobi, Plo Koon, and Anakin Skywalker, alongside a force of clone troopers, to prevent Hisseen from falling into the hands of the Separatists. During the battle, Kenobi, Koon, and Skywalker dueled Count Dooku and his Sith apprentice Asajj Ventress after the Separatists took the Hisseenian parliament hostage.
